If you are looking for stationarity-test, have a look at the `tseries`-package. It includes the following tests for unit-roots and stationarity:

- Augmented-Dickey-Fuller Test `adf.test`
- Kwiatkowski-Phillips-Schmidt-Shin (KPSS) test `kpss.test`
- Box-Pierce and Ljung-Box test `Box.test`
- Phillips-Perron test `PP.test`
